title: Drawing, "Design for a poster: "Modern Lighting Techniques"", 1935
medium: Colored paints on paper, mounted on muslin
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Vertical rectangle. An abstract figure composed of lightning bolts holds a charged filament over his head.  Title above and below.
